filesSelection.explainationLogs: Indicate here the files you want to enrich by ezunpaywall. The only condition is that they must have a DOI field.
filesSelection.explainationTestsLogs: Need files to enrich to validate your installation? We provide some on GitHub.

general.data_standard: Indicates the data collection approaches used for this resource
general.is_oa: Is there an OA copy of this resource
general.is_paratext: Is the item an ancillary part of a journal, like a table of contents
general.journal_is_in_doaj: Is this resource published in a DOAJ-indexed journal
general.journal_is_oa: Is this resource published in a completely OA journal
general.journal_issn_l: A single ISSN for the journal publishing this resource
general.journal_issns: Any ISSNs assigned to the journal publishing this resource
general.journal_name: The name of the journal publishing this resource
general.oa_status: The OA status, or color, of this resource
general.published_date: The date this resource was published
general.publisher: The name of this resource's publisher
general.title: The title of this resource
general.updated: Time when the data for this resource was last updated
general.year: The year this resource was published

oa_location.evidence: How unpaywall found this OA location
oa_location.host_type: The type of host that serves this OA location
oa_location.is_best: Is this location the best_oa_location for its resource
oa_location.license: The license under which this copy is published
oa_location.pmh_id: OAI-PMH endpoint where we found this location
oa_location.updated: Time when the data for this location was last updated
oa_location.url: The url_for_pdf if there is one; otherwise landing page URL
oa_location.url_for_landing_page: The URL for a landing page describing this OA copy
oa_location.url_for_pdf: The URL with a PDF version of this OA copy
oa_location.version: The content version accessible at this location

InUpdate.status: Unpaywall data Update is in progress

NoInUpdate.status: No unpaywall data update is in progress
